verbose_text: To connect PDE inhibition with their physiological effects, we tested the PDE inhibitory potential of four promising food plant extracts : strawberry tree (Arbutus unedo L., Ericaceae) fruit extract (SFE), green tea (Camellia sinensis L., Theaceae) leaf extract (TXE), artichoke (Cynara scolymus L., Asteraceae) leaf extract (ALE) and ginger (Zingiber officinale Roscoe, Zingiberaceae) rhizome extract (GPE).
evidence: PDE inhibitory potential of four promising food plant extracts
